title: BDYi Acupuncture - New York, NY
description: Specialties: Acupuncture clinic of "Health within & Brilliance out" encapsulating the essence to healing, emphasizing that true welllness unlocks the full of potential of your health and vital charm. Welcome to my clinic of healing and renewal, where you can experience a variety of complimentary, boutique style treatments for detox, weight control, cosmetic, pain, allergies & general symptoms. Professional treatments and Korean style cosmetic pre-post procedures assists your brilliance to radiate outwardly through your balanced health flowing freely from within. Feel free to book on the website or by texting 973-216-8828.
